    • createReader

      public org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader createReader​(java.lang.String[] pArgs)
      createReader creates and sets up a singleton reader. This reader is synchronized across the n servers. The default reader is the text reader.
      Parameters:
      pArgs - relies upon the arguement --inputFormat= with the values coming from FrameworkBaselineApplicaiton.TEXT_READER_ ....
      Returns:
      CollectionReader

    • run

      public void run​(long pNumberToProcess, int pInitialNumberOfServers, int pMaxNumberOfServers, int pMaxSystemLoad, int recycleAt, int pSeconds) throws java.lang.Exception
      run - start with 1 thread. Let it run for a while. Test to see if the machine load is less than some threshold. If not, add an additional thread. Report the number of threads employed, and the amount of memory used.
      Parameters:
      pNumberToProcess - the number to process
      pInitialNumberOfServers - the initial number of servers
      pMaxNumberOfServers - the max number of servers
      pMaxSystemLoad - the max system load
      recycleAt - the recycle at
      pSeconds - (how many seconds to wait before waking up and reporting and seeing when to recycle
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - the exception
